meanings.sent1: The rapiered swordsman stood ready for battle.
meanings.sent2: The knight's rapiered weapon gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The rapiered fencer danced gracefully around the ring.
meanings.sent4: Her wit was as sharp as a rapiered blade.
meanings.sent5: The rapiered attire added a touch of elegance to his outfit.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a rapier.
meanings.sent1: The rapiered design of the building's spire was intricate.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was as swift and sharp as a rapiered attack.
meanings.sent3: The rapiered writing style cut straight to the point.
meanings.sent4: His rapiered wit left his friends in stitches.
meanings.sent5: The rapiered movements of the dancer were mesmerizing to watch.
